footer.desc: Explore a collection of video games interfaces and find inspiration for your designs.
footer.trademark: Video games, pictures, all trademarks, and registered trademarks are the property of their respective owners.

tips.objective.line1: Control your character and explore the open world
tips.objective.line2: Complete main and side quests to gain experience and rewards
tips.objective.line3: Collect rare items and equipment to enhance your character
tips.objective.line4: Defeat powerful enemies and bosses to become legendary
tips.mechanics.line1: Open world exploration with seamless transitions
tips.mechanics.line2: Rich quest system with branching storylines
tips.mechanics.line3: Diverse combat system and skill trees
tips.mechanics.line4: Dynamic weather and day/night cycles affect gameplay
tips.hints.line1: Prioritize main quests early to unlock more content
tips.hints.line2: Explore hidden areas on the map for rare equipment
tips.hints.line3: Interact with NPCs to get important information and quest clues
tips.hints.line4: Manage resources wisely to upgrade character attributes and gear
tips.proTipContent: Use terrain to your advantage in combat. High ground and cover can help you defeat stronger enemies easily. Always stock up on supplies and ammo before key battles.
tips.experienceDescription: Experience what makes this game the most immersive adventure ever created!
tips.feature1Description: Cutting-edge physics engine delivers realistic interactions and environmental destruction for an unprecedented gaming experience.
tips.feature2Description: Explore three distinctly different open-world environments, each with unique terrain, weather, and challenges to master.
tips.feature3Description: Unlike many modern games, this title focuses entirely on player skill rather than unlocks or upgrades.

features.title: Crazy Cattle 3D Features
features.rageInducingDesc: Our intentionally chaotic physics engine will have you screaming at your screen and coming back for more!
features.battleRoyaleDesc: Fight with up to 100 other sheep in a physics-driven battle to be the last one standing.
features.addictiveDesc: The perfect balance of challenge and fun, creating that 'just one more game' feeling.
features.customizableDesc: Unlock hundreds of accessories and outfits to make your rage-filled sheep uniquely yours.
features.competitiveDesc: Cross-platform play lets you rage with friends on any device across all global servers.
features.freeToPlayDesc: No pay-to-win mechanics, just pure skill-based (and luck-based) sheep combat.

download.title: Download the Complete Crazy Cattle 3D Experience
download.description: Download now and experience the craziest sheep battle ever created!
download.securityNote: All files are scanned for viruses and malware. Please check your system requirements before downloading.

publishModal.title: Publish New Content
publishModal.invalidFileTypeMessage: Invalid file type. Only image files are allowed.

articles.title: Gaming Experiences
articles.subtitle: Share your gaming moments and experiences
articles.aboutContent: Gaming Experiences is a place where players share their insights, tips, and memorable moments from games. You can upload screenshots, share strategies, or record your gaming feelings.
articles.joinCommunity: Join our community, interact with other players, and discover more exciting content!
articles.shareExperiences: Share personal gaming experiences and insights
articles.giveAdvice: Provide useful game tips and strategies
articles.respectOthers: Respect other users' opinions and experiences
articles.joinCommunityText: Share your gaming moments with players around the world!

about.heroDescription: Explore a world of infinite gaming possibilities and discover your own exciting adventure. We are dedicated to bringing players the highest quality gaming experience.
about.missionDescription1: Blue Prince is committed to creating a gaming platform full of creativity and passion, where every player can find their own gaming space.
about.missionDescription2: We believe that gaming is not just entertainment, but an art form that connects people, inspires creativity, and brings infinite possibilities.
about.feature1Description: Strictly selected to present only the highest quality gaming content
about.feature2Description: Get the latest game news and updates in real time
about.feature3Description: Join the player community and share your gaming experiences
about.contactDescription: Any questions or suggestions? We welcome your feedback anytime!

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: Welcome to Blue Prince. We are committed to protecting your personal information and your right to privacy.
privacy.introduction: This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you use our services.
privacy.introductionP1: We take your privacy seriously and are committed to protecting your personal information. This policy explains what information we collect, how we use it, and your rights regarding your data.
privacy.introductionP2: By using our services, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy.

cookie.title: Cookie Policy
cookie.intro: This Cookie Policy explains how Blue Prince uses cookies and similar technologies.
cookie.aboutCookiesDesc: Cookies are small text files that are placed on your device when you visit our website. They help us provide you with a better experience and allow certain features to work.
cookie.whatAreCookiesDesc: Cookies are small pieces of data stored on your device that help us remember your preferences and improve your browsing experience.
cookie.howWeUseCookiesDesc: We use cookies for various purposes, including:
cookie.preferenceCookies: Preference cookies to remember your settings
cookie.statisticsCookies: Analytics cookies to improve our service

copyright.title: Copyright Complaints
copyright.intro: Blue Prince respects intellectual property rights.
copyright.statementDesc: We take intellectual property rights seriously and expect our users to do the same. This policy outlines how to report copyright infringement and how we handle such reports.
copyright.requirementsDesc: To submit a copyright complaint, please include:

terms.title: Terms and Conditions
terms.intro: These terms govern your use of our services.
terms.welcomeDesc: Please read these terms carefully before using our services. By accessing or using our services, you agree to be bound by these terms.
terms.userContentDesc: When you create, upload, or share content on our platform:
terms.userContentTerm1: You retain ownership of your content
terms.userContentTerm2: You grant us license to use your content
terms.userContentTerm3: You are responsible for your content
terms.userContentTerm4: We may remove content that violates terms
terms.userContentTerm5: You must respect others' intellectual property
